name: Autumn Tree Nursery Wall decal Removable
description:
Adding a bit of nature to your child's room has never been easier. Our Autumn tree wall decal measures overall 80" tall by 70" wide as shown (the tree alone is 70" tall by 46" wide) and comes in several pieces for easy installation. We make each wall decal set to order, After the sale, so we can make your removable wall decal in any of our 56 stock colors. We believe you should be able to choose from as many colors as possible for your wall decal. This is a 5 color wall decal kit 1. color for the tree. 2. color for half of leaves. 3. color for other half of leaves. 4. color for the birds. 5. color for the squirrel. Please remember to list all your color choices for your wall decal when checking out in the message to seller box to insure a speedy process. Also included: An application tool with easy instructions as well as a installation video link here http://ow.ly/1XUw1 This is a wall decal kit, you will be getting the wall decal in several pieces to place wherever you wish.
WHY OUR WALL DECALS?

All of our decals are very easy to apply. They look great on any wall, window, or mirror and are perfectly suited for any smooth, clean surface. We highly recommend Matte finish for inside use, as it gives a deep rich, almost hand painted look.

We are a handmade shop, this simple means we make all our own decals. We make each set to order, after the sale, so we can make your decal in any of our stock colors. Each one of our decals is made from the finest high quality self-adhesive vinyl.

Want your decal facing the other way? Just add "MIRRORED" in your notes when ordering.

We create each Decal AFTER your purchase so that we can make them in the color of your choice and facing the direction you want. If you would like your decal to face the other way, just add “mirror” in your notes and we will make it that way.

Please choose from our color chart the color and finish (Matte or Gloss) you would like your decal made in and include it in the "Message to Seller" box on PayPal when ordering or use our contact button.

 

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Every decal comes with Complete, Easy to follow instructions that will walk you through each step. Follow this link and you will find a video tutorial that demonstrates each step.

SHIPPING

We make, then ship worldwide from DeMotte, Indiana, USA! Most Orders will ship within 24 to 48 hours of receipt of payment, color selection, and address verification.
Please allow 3-5 business days for delivery via USPS first class Mail for domestic orders (Estimated delivery time for USPS).

PAYMENT

Please remit payment at time of ordering. We accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express through PayPal. If paying through PayPal, please be sure the ship to address matches the address on your PayPal account. If the address is different, please make a notation of this in the message to seller section on PayPal.

Please note: All images, graphics, and Text are either copyrighted by or licensed to Vinyl Wall Designs

name: Baby Dinosaur with butterfly Wall Decal
description:
A cute wall decal of a baby dinosaur with a butterfly that would look great in any child's room or nursery. The baby dinosaur is 22" tall by 32" long and comes with a 3" by 3½" butterfly on it's back. This is a 2 color decal, one color for the dino and one color for the butterfly. An application tool with easy instructions as well as a installation video link here http://ow.ly/1XUw1 , just copy and paste to see the video. They are shown here on a nursery wall, but could go where ever your imagination takes you. Please remember to choose your colors in the message to seller area on PayPal.

description:

description:

This wall decal mural as shown measure 30" wide and 32" tall from the top of the chain to the bottom of the lowest cage and come in several pieces so installation is easy. name: Wall Decal Art - Keep Calm and Carry On - available in 3 sizes
description:
This vinyl decal is great advise in these troubled times. Keep Calm and Carry On is from a World War II poster from England. They were printed with plans to place them around the country to remind folks to Stay Calm and Carry on, but it never happened, and they where lost for years. This is our LARGEST version of this poster measures 20" wide by 38" tall. But this wall decal is available in 3 sizes. 20" x 38" $27.50 12.5" x 24" $19.50 10" x 18" $17.50

name: Wall Decal Art Sticker - Keep Calm and Carry on Poster style- available in 4 sizes
description:
This vinyl wall decal is great advise in these troubled times. Keep Calm and Carry On is from a World War II poster from England. They were printed with plans to place them around the country to remind folks to Stay Calm and Carry on, but it never happened, and they where lost for years. This is our LARGER version of this decal with the original crown and is make in poster style, it measures 22" wide by 34" tall. It is made in "die-cut" which means the lettering will be what ever color your wall is and the letter are cut out from the background. This wall decal is available in 4 sizes. 22" x 34" $27.50 20" x 38" $27.50 12.5"x24" $19.50 10" x 18" $17.50
WHY OUR WALL DECALS?

All of our decals are very easy to apply. They look great on any wall, window, or mirror and are perfectly suited for any smooth, clean surface. We highly recommend Matte finish for inside use, as it gives a deep rich, almost hand painted look.

We are a handmade shop, this simple means we make all our own decals. We make each set to order, after the sale, so we can make your decal in any of our stock colors. Each one of our decals is made from the finest high quality self-adhesive vinyl.

Want your decal facing the other way? Just add "MIRRORED" in your notes when ordering.

We create each Decal AFTER your purchase so that we can make them in the color of your choice and facing the direction you want. If you would like your decal to face the other way, just add “mirror” in your notes and we will make it that way.

Please choose from our color chart the color and finish (Matte or Gloss) you would like your decal made in and include it in the "Message to Seller" box on PayPal when ordering or use our contact button.

Every decal comes with Complete, Easy to follow instructions that will walk you through each step. Follow this link and you will find a video tutorial that demonstrates each step.

description:
